paramInformation.label: Total Alarm Duration
paramInformation.description: Total time the Leak Sensor will beep and light its LED in the event of a leak

paramInformation.label: Mute Time
paramInformation.description: Quiet time between each Reminder Alarm

paramInformation.label: Initial Alarm
paramInformation.description: Time the Leak Sensor beeps before it is muted

paramInformation.label: Reminder Alarm
paramInformation.description: Length of each beep after the Initial Alarm

paramInformation.label: Enable/Disable Audible Alarm
paramInformation.description: Enables or disables the audible alarm (“beeping”)

paramInformation.label: Enable/Disable Water Detection
paramInformation.description: If disabled, the device will not respond in any way to detected leaks.

paramInformation.label: Basic Set Level
paramInformation.description: The value sent by the BASIC_SET command to Association Group 2
